meanings.definition: A person who swims using the breaststroke technique.
meanings.sent1: During the race, the breaststrokers showed their skill in the pool.
meanings.sent2: The breaststrokers at the competition were very fast swimmers.
meanings.sent3: The group of breaststrokers looked like graceful dolphins in the water.
meanings.sent4: Among all the swimmers, the breaststrokers moved with elegant precision.
meanings.sent5: The coach praised the breaststrokers for their smooth and powerful strokes.

meanings.definition: The act of swimming using the breaststroke technique.
meanings.sent1: The breaststrokers' technique was flawless during the relay.
meanings.sent2: In the swimming class, they practiced the breaststrokers repeatedly.
meanings.sent3: During the synchronized swimming routine, the breaststrokers added a unique flair.
meanings.sent4: The pool echoed with the rhythmic splashes of the breaststrokers.
meanings.sent5: Watching the breaststrokers glide through the water was mesmerizing.
